segments.text: I see the water pouring over the edge of the sink, and it’s just getting worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even seem to notice her foot is wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading fast, and the floor is going to be a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she’s just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are too busy with the cookies to care about the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a strange scene, like something out of a cartoon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the water will reach the stool and make it even more unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how absurd this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I also know it’s going to end badly if no one does anything.
segments.speaker: PAR
